title: 87/348/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 June 1987 amending the limits of the less-favoured areas in France within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 11 June 1987
amending the limits of the less-favoured areas in France within the meaning of Council Directive 75/268/EEC
(Only the French text is authentic)
(87/348/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: With effect from the winter of 1986/87, the list of less-favoured areas in France as set out in the Annex to Directive 75/271/EEC is hereby amended in accordance with the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 June 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 33.
(4) OJ No L 382, 31. 12. 1986, p. 23.
